scrabble
Class TestCases

java.lang.Object
  scrabble.TestCases

public class TestCases
extends java.lang.Object

This class consists of one method and exists for the sole purpose of reading given specialized .scrabble files and converting them into a Scrabble object that can be used with the provided GUI to allow for testing. The format of the .scrabble files must follow that of the example shown in the spec file

Author:
atkinsjm

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

readTest

public static Scrabble readTest(java.lang.String input)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Reads a special '.scrabble' file that contains the necessary data to create a Scrabble class (essentially the state of the game at any given moment). It then returns a Scrabble configure as the given file dictates

Parameters:
input - name (must end in '.scrabble'
Returns:
Scrabble object representing the board state
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the given file name is not found or does not end in scrabble
